original_text: This may happen to you: Someone says, “You have done something wrong against me.” So he takes hold of you to go to the judge. Before you arrive at the office of the judge, try to agree with this man how to make things right again. If you do not agree together about the problem, it may be bad for you. The judge will give you to his officer. The officer will put you in prison.
korean_text: 네가 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 법관에게 갈 때에 길에서 화해하기를 힘쓰라 그가 너를 재판장에게 끌어 가고 재판장이 너를 옥졸에게 넘겨 주어 옥졸이 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.korean_translation: 이런 일이 너에게 일어날 수 있다

sentences.original_text: You have done something wrong against me
So he takes hold of you
Before you arrive at the office of the judge
try to agree with this man
how to make things right again
If you do not agree together about the problem
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 문제에 대해 함께 동의하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: it may be bad for you
The judge will give you to his officer
sentences.korean_translation: 판사는 너를 그의 관리에게 넘길 것이다

sentences.original_text: The officer will put you in prison
